Dataset

name:
ECJ case law text similarity analysis

Generated by

name:
docona
description:
DoConA (Document Content and Citation Analysis Pipeline) is an open source, configurable and extensible Python tool to analyse the level of agreement between the citation network of a set of textual documents and the textual similarity of these documents.
category:
Python script
operating system:
cross-platform
version:
1.0
url:
https://github.com/MaastrichtU-IDS/docona

Depends on

name:
ECJ case law and citation network
description:
Citation network and full text documents of each judgement by the Court of Justice of the European Union that was published publicly on the EUR-LEX website (https://eur-lex.europa.eu/homepage.html) up until December 2018
version:
2.0
url:
https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3926736
